message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
A fair split, but I'll try to negotiate a better deal for myself!
You wanted a better deal for yourself? Let's see how you like it!
You're trying to squeeze me out! I'll try to get a better deal, but I'll give you a slightly better offer this time.
I'm not getting squeezed out that easily! You can do better than that.
You're getting desperate, I can tell! I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give up my advantage yet.
It's time to meet in the middle. No more games!
